Why your iPhone 7 needs insurance

You could end up damaging your phone any time, any where, and repairs aren't cheap. How much could it cost? Find out here.

  • Speaker failure
    Rs 3,572
  • Touchscreen malfunction
    Rs 6,448
  • Crooked screen
    Rs 6,000
  • Liuid damage
    Rs 9,448
  • Physcial damage
    Rs 2,291
  • Microphone failure
    Rs 9,448
  • Home button failure
    Rs 1,280
